title: How green plants make and use food. - Rev. ed.
brief_description: Uses clear animation and time-lapse microphotography to show how materials reach the leaves of a plant from the roots and how light supplies the energy for the manufacture of sugar. Clarifies the difference between food and raw materials and between photosynthesis and cellular respiration. Suitable for lower and middle secondary levels.
